entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Berens River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
